name: Tomas Lindberg
description:
'''Tomas''' "'''Tompa'''" '''Lindberg''' (16 October 1972 â€“ 16 September 2025), also known as "'''Goatspell'''", was a Swedish vocalist who fronted many [[death metal music|death metal]] bands, most notably [[At the Gates]]. He was active as a musician and composer since the late 1980s. He also taught [[social studies]].

Lindberg was ranked number 30 out of 50 of The Greatest Metal Frontmen of All Time by [[Roadrunner Records]].
